Yes, Tuscany has many restaurants that serve excellent local cuisine and pair well with the local wine. Here are some suggestions:

1. La Bottega del Buon Caffè in Florence: This upscale restaurant offers a menu of contemporary Tuscan cuisine paired with a carefully curated wine list that features many local labels. 2. Osteria Le Logge in Siena: This cozy Tuscan restaurant has a charming atmosphere and serves traditional dishes made with locally sourced ingredients. 3. Osteria di Casa Chianti in Radda in Chianti: This charming restaurant is set inside an old country house and offers a rustic Tuscan menu that changes based on the season. 4. Ristorante La Torre in Montalcino: This fine dining restaurant offers a menu of creative Tuscan cuisine paired with an extensive wine list that features many local Brunello di Montalcino wines. 5. Trattoria Toscana in San Gimignano: This casual restaurant serves simple yet delicious Tuscan dishes such as pappardelle with wild boar ragù, and many other dishes that pair well with the local wines. These are just a few examples of many great restaurants in Tuscany that pair well with the local wine, and it's best to book in advance to secure your table as they can be quite popular.
